definition: gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: Install heavy-duty pickup trucks and armed with heavy machine guns, weapons and soldiers are fighting.
sentences.chinese: 安裝了重型武器的皮卡和手持重機槍的士兵也在戰鬥。

sentences.english: The Americans returned fire with heavy machine guns and grenade launchers.
sentences.chinese: 美國人用重機槍和榴彈發射器回擊。

sentences.english: This is a multi-barrel heavy machine gun on an anti-aircraft mount.
sentences.chinese: 圖中爲設置在高射機槍架的多管重機槍。

sentences.english: A heavy machinegun without a tripod to put it on is functionally worthless.
sentences.chinese: 一架沒有三腳架的重機槍是毫無作用的。

sentences.english: These guys will handle the soviet standard lafette HMG.
sentences.chinese: 這些人將操作蘇聯標準的支架重機槍。
